plot: He's seen her face a thousand times but can't remember her name- the mysterious girl who's fallen in love, but is condemned to be forgotten.
title: To Be Remembered
plot_es: He's seen her face a thousand times but can't remember her name- the mysterious girl who's fallen in love, but is condemned to be forgotten.
plot_en: He's seen her face a thousand times but can't remember her name- the mysterious girl who's fallen in love, but is condemned to be forgotten.
